L001.name: Town Square
L001.desc_en: The cobbled heart of the harbor town. Lanterns hang from iron posts, a weathered fountain burbles at the center, and every major street spills into this crossroads of exhausted townsfolk, shouting vendors, and passing sailors. Talk of bloodstains and lost sleep hangs under every conversation.
L001.desc_zh: 鹅卵石铺就的港镇广场，灯笼摇曳、喷泉潺潺，是人群与流言交汇的十字路口。

L002.name: Market Stalls
L002.desc_en: A ring of canvas-topped stalls crowd the edge of the square. Fishmongers, spice sellers, and tinkers hawk their wares while children weave between crates and baskets.
L002.desc_zh: 广场边缘布棚成环，商贩云集、叫卖喧阗；鱼鲜香料陈列其间，孩童穿梭如织。

L003.name: Temple of the Tide
L003.desc_en: A modest stone temple overlooking the square, its doors carved with waves and storm-clouds. Inside, candles flicker before a statue of a calm, watchful sea goddess. Many townsfolk come here seeking answers for the nights they cannot remember.
L003.desc_zh: 俯瞰广场的石砌小庙，门扉刻着浪与云；烛光映照海之女神像，失忆之夜的疑问在此回响。

L004.name: Town Hall
L004.desc_en: A tall, timber-framed hall with a slate roof and creaking signboard. Notices are nailed to a board outside, and a pair of clerks shuffle papers just inside the main doors. The notice board is cluttered with reports of nocturnal disturbances and 'unsettling stains' found in private homes.
L004.desc_zh: 木梁高耸的市政厅，门口告示板钉满夜间异动与“诡异血迹”的报告，文书往来不停。

L005.name: Harbor Gate
L005.desc_en: An archway of weathered stone opening toward the piers. Guard posts on either side watch the flow of carts and sailors between the town and the docks.
L005.desc_zh: 通往码头的风化石拱门，两侧岗哨监视车马与水手的进出。

L006.name: Docks
L006.desc_en: Wooden piers stretch out over dark water, crowded with fishing boats and the occasional merchant ship. Ropes creak, gulls wheel overhead, and the smell of tar and brine hangs thick in the air.
L006.desc_zh: 木栈延海，渔船商舶往返不绝；绳索作响、海鸥盘旋，柏油与咸风交织。

L007.name: Warehouse Row
L007.desc_en: A line of squat stone warehouses hugs the waterfront. Their heavy doors and barred windows suggest both valuable cargo and things better kept out of sight. One doorframe bears a faded, rusty smear that no one can quite explain.
L007.desc_zh: 滨岸石仓林立，重门铁窗、讳莫如深；门框上残留难以解释的锈红污痕。

L008.name: Smuggler's Entrance
L008.desc_en: A half-concealed grate and narrow stone steps leading below the warehouses. The smell of damp and old river-mud clings to the air here.
L008.desc_zh: 仓下暗格半掩，石阶曲折通幽；潮湿泥腥挥之不去。

L009.name: Old Well
L009.desc_en: An old stone well at the edge of the square, its rope replaced more than once. Locals say its water never runs dry, and that it connects to forgotten tunnels beneath the town. Faint rust-brown stains cling to some of the stones as though someone once washed something away here.
L009.desc_zh: 古井傍市，传言通往地下旧道；井石带锈，如曾洗去不可言之物。

L010.name: Watch Barracks
L010.desc_en: A sturdy building flying the town's colors. Racks of spears stand by the door, and off-duty guards swap stories on the steps when the weather is mild.
L010.desc_zh: 守军营房旗帜高悬，枪架森然；卫士闲谈间亦闻风声鹤唳。

L011.name: East Alley
L011.desc_en: A narrow, shadowed alley slipping between tall buildings. Laundry lines crisscross overhead, and the back doors of several shops and taverns open onto it. Here and there, someone has scrubbed at dark stains that refuse to fully fade from the cobbles.
L011.desc_zh: 狭巷幽暗，衣绳纵横，店铺酒馆后门相连；暗斑被反复刷洗仍难褪尽。

L012.name: Back Door - Copper Cup
L012.desc_en: A plain wooden door at the rear of the Copper Cup, used by staff and late-night regulars. Crates and empty barrels stack nearby, and the smell of stew drifts out when it opens. A faint dark streak runs along one stone, as if something was once dragged past in a hurry.
L012.desc_zh: 铜杯酒馆的朴素后门，常供伙计与夜客出入；箱桶堆叠，门开时炖汤香溢出，地石有被拖拽的暗痕。

L013.name: Old Shrine
L013.desc_en: A crumbling wayside shrine tucked into a bend of the alley, its carvings worn by sea-wind and salt. Offerings of shells and coins gather in a shallow stone bowl.
L013.desc_zh: 残祠藏于巷角，海风侵蚀；贝壳钱币为供，香火未绝。

L014.name: South Bridge
L014.desc_en: A low stone bridge arching over a narrow river that feeds the harbor. Lanterns line the parapet, and you can see both the town walls and the distant open sea from its center. More than one passerby has reported waking here with aching feet and no memory of how they arrived.
L014.desc_zh: 石桥横河，灯列如星；桥心可望城墙与远海，有人梦醒于此，却不记来路。

L015.name: Riverside Path
L015.desc_en: A muddy path following the riverbank toward the outskirts. Reeds whisper in the breeze, and shallow boats are pulled up onto the shore.
L015.desc_zh: 沿河通往郊外的泥泞小径，芦苇随风低语，浅舟被拖上岸边。

L016.name: Fishermen's Shacks
L016.desc_en: A cluster of small wooden shacks perched on pilings above the river. Nets hang to dry, and lantern-light spills from half-open doors late into the night. In more than one doorway, dark stains mar the floorboards with no memory of how they appeared.
L016.desc_zh: 河上木棚，渔网晾晒、灯火微明；多处门槛地板有来历不明的暗斑。

L017.name: Lumberyard
L017.desc_en: Stacks of freshly cut logs and the tang of sap fill the air. A small shack nearby shows scuffed floorboards and a corner where someone scrubbed at dried, dark stains.
L017.desc_zh: 木料场新料堆积、松脂扑鼻；旁边小屋地板磨损，角落有被刷洗过的干涸暗迹。

L018.name: Wizard's House
L018.desc_en: A tall stone house with shuttered windows and a heavy iron fence, set just off the square. Lanterns burn late behind the curtains, and a pair of hired guards discourage casual callers.
L018.desc_zh: 高墙铁篱之宅，门窗紧闭，帘后灯火长明；雇佣守卫拒绝闲人靠近。

L019.name: Copper Cup
L019.desc_en: A low-beamed harbor tavern. Lanterns swing above crowded tables, and the air smells of stew, sea-salt, and woodsmoke. The barkeep Mara watches everything from behind the counter.
L019.desc_zh: 海港酒馆“铜杯”，梁低而人声鼎沸，灯笼摇曳；酒香海味交杂；老板娘玛拉在吧台后洞察一切。

L020.name: Bar Counter
L020.desc_en: Shelves of bottles, a till, and crates tucked beneath. A loose crate hides something wedged behind it.
L020.desc_zh: 瓶架林列、暗格潜藏；松动木箱之后似有密物。

L021.name: Stair Landing
L021.desc_en: A narrow staircase creaks toward the upper rooms. A rope discourages casual wanderers.
L021.desc_zh: 吱呀作响的窄楼梯通往二层，绳索拦着闲杂闯入。

L022.name: Storeroom Door
L022.desc_en: A stout oak door with a brass four-dial combination lock. The correct code is 0415.
L022.desc_zh: 厚橡木库门带黄铜四位拨盘锁，正确密码为0415。
